title: Critical Thinking and Practical Problem-Solving Skills Development Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics knowledge and practical work experience
context.additional_context: Delivering critical thinking and practical problem-solving techniques immediately applicable to in-service professionals' workplace challenges.

learning_goals: Learners can apply a three-stage framework for systematically analyzing complex real-world problems.
Learners can propose creative math-based solutions using the design thinking process.
Learners can select optimal decision-making pathways with over 80% accuracy in problem-based learning (PBL) scenarios.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
